sections.paragraph: + A Levite in the time of Ezra. (Nehemiah 9:4,5) He sealed the covenant with Nehemiah. (Nehemiah 10:10) (B.C. 459.) + A priest or priestly family who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah. (Nehemiah 10:4; 12:14) Called [1091]Shechaniah, [1092]Shechaniah in (Nehemiah 12:3) + Another Levite who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah. (Nehemiah 10:12) + One of the priests appointed by David to blow with the trumpets before the ark of God. (1 Chronicles 15:24) (B.C. 1043.)
